speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Beazley on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education on initiatives to complement school curricula providing appropriate support measures to include the European dimension ( 2006/2041(INI) ) ( A6-0267/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Beazley on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education on initiatives to complement school curricula providing appropriate support measures to include the European dimension ( 2006/2041(INI) ) ( A6-0267/2006 ).
agenda_item: The European dimension of school teaching materials (debate)
